features: Pampers Overnight Diapers help keep baby’s skin dry all night long with 50% more absorbent zones vs. ordinary diaper* ( *Swaddlers Overnights vs. Everyday-of-the-Year diaper)
New! Pampers Swaddlers Overnight Diapers with Blowout Barrier help prevent leaks, even blowouts, for up to 100% leakproof nights. Less leaks means more restful sleep
Help keep baby’s skin healthy for up to 12 hours with our best diapers for overnight featuring a moisture-wicking BreatheFree Liner
Our best overnight diapers feature Dual Leak-Guard Leg Barriers to provide all-night protection where leaks happen most. Available in Pampers Swaddlers Overnights diapers size 3–21
Our extra absorbent overnight diapers gently protect skin from irritation and wetness with ultrasoft, absorbent layers
Trusted protection from Pampers, the #1 Pediatrician-recommended brand
Size 3–7 overnight diapers are available in 8 nighttime prints. Product and packaging may vary
body.description: Say goodbye to overnight leakage with new and improved Pampers Swaddlers Overnights. Our best diapers for overnight now feature a Blowout Barrier at the back waist to help prevent up to 100% of leaks, even blowouts. Featuring 50% more absorbent zones than ordinary diapers* to help distribute wetness evenly and keep baby’s skin dry and comfortable all night long. Less leaks mean more restful sleep. With Pampers Overnight Diapers, you can rest assured that you have superior absorbency, while keeping baby’s skin dry and healthy, no matter how baby sleeps. The BreatheFree Liner in Overnight Diapers size 3–7 wicks away moisture, allowing baby's skin to breathe, while the LockAway Channels pull wetness into the core of the diaper to help prevent irritation. Also, our best overnight diapers feature Dual Leak-Guard Barriers at the legs to help protect where leaks happen most. These nighttime diapers are dermatologist approved by the Skin Health Alliance, hypoallergenic, and free of parabens and latex,† so you can trust them to be safe and gentle on your little one’s delicate skin. Size 3–7 overnight diapers feature eight sweet nighttime prints. For trusted protection, trust Pampers, the #1 pediatrician recommended brand.** Product and packaging may vary. Download the Pampers Club App today and earn Pampers Cash*** Redeem your Pampers Cash for exclusive Pampers coupon savings and rewards. *Swaddlers Overnights vs. ”Everyday-of-the-year” brand **#1 Pediatrician Recommended Brand: Based on a 2021 survey of US & Canadian pediatricians. ***Only redeemable via Pampers Club. No cash value. 0% PARABENS AND LATEX: Latex—natural rubber

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Tummy Sleepers
reviews.reviewText: My baby is a tummy sleeper and would leak through all her diapers in the middle of the night. We have been using these for about a month now and have not had any leaks! They look nearly identical to the regular pampers, but gave nighttime designs on them. They are not any bulkier than the original diaper. Very soft and stretchy fit for baby!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No leaking diaper!!
reviews.reviewText: This is our go to over night diaper for our baby!! We have tried other brands before and the other brands have caused urine leakage which caused our baby to wake up in the middle of the night! This brand is good and does not leak anything! I would recommend it! It’s soft on baby and even smells good! Good price and value! Give it a try!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absorbs pretty well
reviews.reviewText: I've been trying so many diapers for my little boy, and this is the best for night. I still get occasional leaks (about once or twice a week, maybe?), but this is much better than the constant leaks from the other diapers. If it doesn't leak, it can hold for a good 7 hours or so. By leak, I mean that my 4 month old will wake up with a large circle of pee on his onesie. I feel this happens because somehow the pee came up the wrong way, not that the diaper was too full, because I've had these sorts of leaks after 3 or 4 hours of sleep some nights without a full diaper, when I know we've done 7 hours without leaks but with a full diaper. Summary: I would recommend this. This is the night diaper that I am using. Huggies was good but left my baby's bum too dry and itchy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Nighttime Game Changer - All night protection
reviews.reviewText: Pampers Swaddlers Overnights Diapers have been a true lifesaver for our household, especially when dealing with a toddler who can put away half a watermelon before bedtime. These diapers are nothing short of impressive when it comes to all-night leak protection. We were initially skeptical about their claims, but they have exceeded our expectations time and time again. No more midnight diaper changes or disrupted sleep; these diapers are designed to keep little ones dry and comfortable throughout the night.What sets Pampers Swaddlers Overnights apart is their superior absorbency and fit. The extra-absorbent core effectively locks away wetness, preventing leaks and providing up to 12 hours of uninterrupted sleep for our toddler. Even with his impressive watermelon-eating skills, these diapers have proven to be up to the challenge. Additionally, the secure and comfortable fit ensures that the diaper stays in place, even with an active sleeper, offering peace of mind for parents.As parents, we also appreciate the softness and hypoallergenic nature of these diapers. They're gentle on our toddler's sensitive skin, which is essential for a peaceful night's sleep. Plus, the Wetness Indicator is a handy feature that lets us know when it's time for a diaper change, minimizing guesswork and preventing unnecessary disturbances. In conclusion, Pampers Swaddlers Overnights Diapers have been a game-changer for nighttime diapering. Their exceptional leak protection, comfort, and convenience make them a top choice for parents looking to ensure their little one sleeps soundly all night long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant buying these, because I am typically a Huggies mama. However, I can honestly say that these are just as good as the Huggies overnight. They are soft, fit my son perfectly, he does not have any leaking through issues either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Honest Review: Pampers Swaddlers vs Overnights vs Pure
reviews.reviewText: IMAGES (from left to right): Reg Swaddlers, Overnights, PureUPDATE 2/28/20: since writing the review our baby is now 9mo and has had 2 minor leaks and I found that it was because the diaper put on crooked or not tight enough (trying to diaper and dress a squirmy 9mo isn’t easy!). But I still think these work really well.We've tried all three lineups of the Pampers brand for overnight protection and would rate them as follows:1. Overnights (marginally better then the reg Swaddlers)2. Swaddlers3. PureOur baby would sleep 12-12.5hrs a night without waking up since 8weeks, but around 5mo he started to sleep on his tummy, and that was when the leakage problem became more regular. We tried sizing up on diapers. Still little help. We added a Sposie pad to his bigger diaper. It helped most nights, still had leakage. We'd also point his peepee down. Sometimes he'd sleep on his side and we'd find leakage by the tabs too, which doesn't have coverage. Because we really like the Pampers Swaddlers fit for him during the day, we thought we tried the Overnights and Pure. We tried all three with the Sposie pad to compare. He doesn't poop at night, so I can't attest to overnight pooping.Thoughts on the OVERNIGHTS: Yes, I agree with other reviewers that they are almost identical to the reg Swaddlers. HOWEVER, it is just when you open the package bc they have been compressed and flattened. I had set aside all three aside to compare and inadvertently discovered that after some time, the Overnights puffed up a little bit and decompressed. They felt thicker and more padded, in an airy way. It was noticeably different from the Swaddlers by now. You can't tell the difference in the picture but just by touch and feel, they feel like they have more material to absorb than before when they were removed from packaging.Thoughts on the PURE: We've used them before for daytime, but didn't like how they fit. They run bigger than the Swaddlers. He'd have regular blowouts bc there wouldn't be a good enough seal despite having a thicker padding. I thought this would be a clear winner bc of how thick these diapers are compared to the reg ones and would better for absorbing pee, but they simply don't fit well at all and he'd still leak around his inner thighs.Ultimately, I found that having a pad + sizing up (if your baby is within close range of the next size, otherwise daytime size is ok) + PLACEMENT of diaper are key. Making sure the diaper and pad were high enough and that the pad not peeping out the diaper. The tabs needed to be flushed/flat against one another, without puckering for optimal protection.The Overnight line worked best for us, then the reg Swaddlers not far behind. The Pure isn't worth trying again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are pretty handy
reviews.reviewText: I have an 18 month old who leaked through the regular pampers during the night. These have done a much better job and since switching to these at night, we have not had a problem. I cannot comment on the potty training aspect as my daughter is not at that stage yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I honestly love the quality of these diapers!! While they still do leak occasionally, they are very effective as an overnight diaper. With the new blowout barrier that Pampers is putting in most of their product line, I imagine they will get even better. Whether this is the size you need or another smaller size, might I suggest you consider this product for overnight leak protection for your little blessing.
Realmente estos pañales han salvado a mi bebé de fugas por las noches, funcionana muy bien, no causan irritación en su piel

As a parent of an active little one, finding the right diaper that offers both comfort and protection is crucial. Pampers Swaddlers Overnights Disposable Baby Diapers in Size 6 have been an absolute game-changer for our family.First and foremost, the fit is impeccable. These diapers are designed with precision, providing a snug and comfortable fit for my toddler. The stretchy sides ensure that the diaper stays securely in place, even during the most energetic playtime or while my child is fast asleep. I appreciate how well they contour to my child’s body, allowing for freedom of movement without compromising on the diaper’s effectiveness.One of the standout features of these diapers is their exceptional leak protection. We’ve experienced no leaks whatsoever, even during long nights. The overnight absorbency is remarkable, keeping my little one dry and comfortable until morning. This not only ensures my child’s uninterrupted sleep but also gives me peace of mind knowing that my baby is sleeping soundly without any discomfort.The quality of the materials used in these diapers is evident. They are soft to the touch, gentle on my baby’s skin, and do not cause any irritation or redness. The wetness indicator is a helpful feature, making it easy to know when it’s time for a diaper change, minimizing the chances of rashes and discomfort.Additionally, the pack size of 42 diapers is convenient, offering a good supply that lasts for an extended period. The ease of ordering online and having them delivered to my doorstep saves me time and effort, making parenting a little bit easier.In summary, Pampers Swaddlers Overnights in Size 6 have exceeded my expectations. Their perfect fit, combined with their outstanding leak protection and overall comfort, make them a top choice for parents of active toddlers. I highly recommend these diapers to fellow parents who are looking for a reliable, high-quality solution to keep their little ones dry and happy, both day and night. With Pampers Swaddlers Overnights, you can confidently say goodbye to leaks and hello to peaceful nights and happy mornings!

Único pañal desechable que aguanta toda la noche con mi bebé. Muy bueno, ligero y suave. El único detalle es que mi bebé tiene la piel sensible y la parte de la tira que se pega para cerrar el panal le lastima un poco la piel si él se mueve mucho y cambia el ajuste del panal. Cómo la uso solo para dormir eso no es un problema. Funciona perfecto!

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelentes! No más pipí en la pijama!
reviews.reviewText: Todas las mañanas mi bebe amanecía mojado. Pero ya no más! Excelentes pañales!
